attributes.action: Permit voting against petitions on this web site
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many citizens will strongly disagree with some of the petitions on this web site.
The web site should be amended  so that votes can be registered either in favour or against petitions.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
